Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供控制項功能來顯示行事曆。

span.span: Provides control capability to display a calendar.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行事曆顯示為天、 週或月。The calendar display is by day, week, or month. 行動裝置上是否呈現整個月份取決於裝置的功能。Whether an entire month is rendered on a mobile device depends on the capabilities of the device. 一般情況下，控制項允許選取的日期。In general, the control permits the selection of a date. 行動控制項換行 Web Form控制項。The mobile control wraps a Web Forms control. 雖然行動控制項模擬某些屬性、 方法和事件的基礎的控制項，不會公開特定 HTML 轉譯的其他屬性。Although the mobile control mimics some properties, methods, and events of the underlying control, it does not expose other properties specific to HTML rendering. 若要修改這些問題，您可以存取透過基礎控制項屬性，並直接修改設定。To modify these, you can access the underlying control through the property and modify the settings directly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何頁面載入的程式碼區塊中的屬性可讓使用者選取一天、 週或月區塊的時間。The following code example shows how the property in the page load code block allows the user to select a day, a week, or a month block of time. 此範例會設定和屬性區別使用者選取的類別。This example sets the and properties of the class to distinguish the user selection. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileCalendarExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCalendarExample/cs/MobileCalendarExample.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileCalendarExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCalendarExample/vb/MobileCalendarExample.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 ASP.NET 應用程式開發介面，列舉包含的每一週的星期幾，傳回伺服器的本機設定的一週的第一天的預設值。In the ASP.NET API, the enumeration contains every day of the week, with the default value returning the server's local setting for the first day of the week. 此屬性函式的相同方式屬性。This property functions the same way as the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按一下以選取一天、 週或整個月份的日期選擇器控制項時，就會引發事件。The event is raised when the user selects a day, a week, or an entire month by clicking the date selector controls. 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 在覆寫方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void RaisePostBackEvent(string eventArgument) cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 會在內部呼叫這個方法。This method is called internally by ASP.NET. 它提供的包裝函式來引發事件時由使用者選取日期。It provides a wrapper to raise the event when a date is selected by the user. 不同於方法，這個方法時為公用，且可以被呼叫不同的配接器時收集選取的日期。Unlike the method, this method is public and can be called by different adapters when they have collected the selected date.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，會使用這個屬性連同屬性來判斷所選的日期的控制項。Typically, you use this property together with the property to determine the selected date of a control. 若要這樣做，請設定屬性-此設定可讓只能從單一日期選取範圍控制項。To do this, set the property to - this setting allows only a single date selection from the control. 瀏覽至下一頁或上一頁月份不會更新這個屬性。Browsing to the next or previous month will not update this property. 這個屬性具有相同的功能為 ASP.NET屬性。This property has the same functionality as the ASP.NET property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來參考所選的日期。The following code example demonstrates how to the use the property to refer to the selected day. 這個範例是針對較大的程式碼範例的一部分概觀。This example is part of a larger code sample for the overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks Web Form列舉型別提供下表中說明的選取項目。The Web Forms enumeration provides the selections described in the following table. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||在 控制項上可以選取單一日期。A single date can be selected on the control.| ||在 控制項上可以選取單一日期或整週。A single date or entire week can be selected on the control.| ||在 控制項上可以選取單一日期、週或整月。A single date, week, or entire month can be selected on the control.| ||在 控制項上沒有可選取的日期。No dates can be selected on the control. **注意：** 避免使用此值，因為某些瀏覽器仍會允許使用者選取日期。**Note:** Avoid using this value, because some browsers still allow the user to select a date.|

exception.span: 指定的值不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The specified value is not one of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 行動控制項不重複的 ASP.NET Web Form 屬性不支援行動裝置的控制項。The ASP.NET mobile controls do not duplicate the properties of the ASP.NET Web Forms control that are not supported on mobile devices. 因此，如果您想要使用所提供的基礎功能控制項，只要存取物件透過屬性。Thus, if you want to use features that are available for the underlying control, you do so by accessing the object through the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用僅供以基礎的屬性，將套用格式化控制項。The following code example uses the property to apply formatting that is only available in the underlying control. 這個範例是針對較大的程式碼範例的一部分概觀。This example is part of a larger code sample for the overview. [!code-csharp[MobileCalendarExample#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCalendarExample/cs/MobileCalendarExample.aspx#10)] [!code-vb[MobileCalendarExample#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCalendarExample/vb/MobileCalendarExample.aspx#10)]
